title: Meta Releases SAM 2 and What It Means for Developers Building Multi-Modal AI
title1: Meta Releases SAM 2 and What It Means for Developers Building Multi-Modal AI - Helicone
title2: Meta Releases SAM 2 and What It Means for Developers Building Multi-Modal AI - Helicone
description: Meta's release of SAM 2 (Segment Anything Model for videos and images) represents a significant leap in AI capabilities, revolutionizing how developers and tools like Helicone approach multi-modal observability in AI systems.
author: Lina Lam
